name: Geode (Neonesque)
description:
Accumulate geodes while delving deep underground to build up the largest geode collection, with simple controls and mechanics similar to sokoban. I tried to stay as simple as possible when I was making this game, with fewer elements and an emphasis on level design. 

Controls:

  • Spacebar or x to select menu options
  • Arrow keys to move
  • z to undo
  • r to restart
  • esc to return to level select
